question: In many children are engaged in different kinds of paid work.Some people regard this as completely wrong, while others consider it a valuable work experience, important for learning and taking responsibility. What is your opinion?
text: Child labour or is a considerable issue around the world. Besides that, the children are involved in several money paid chores. However, others debate that working would enhance a sufficient number of learning and holding responsibilities. Anyway, in my point of view, I firmly agree with both points, in order, the following essay will consider both views.

To being with, in many countries children work for several issues, in order it might amplify many benefits too.For example, many western country children employed during their summer vacation, whereas they earn additional money for their pocket, meanwhile most of Asians been to poor families, hence children occupied in jobs because it always rudimentary to have responsibility for them to support in financially. On the other hand, working during childhood ensued many drawbacks.
